Flow.description: Automation for sending right email for depending on the code

value.stringValue: "National Account Team, The following Prospect Account needs to be set up in VOS, and is part of a national account. Please contact the sales rep if you have any questions or need more details. Prospect Name: " + [Account].Name + " Address: " + [Account].BillingStreet + ", " + [Account].BillingCity + ", " +[Account].BillingState + ", " + [Account].BillingPostalCode + " Duns Number: "+[Account].D_U_N_S__c + ", Segment: " + TEXT([Account].Prospect_Segment__c ) + ", Sales Rep: " + [Account].OwnerId

formulas.name: formula_17_myRule_15_A2_0583416236
formulas.expression: "National Account Team, The following Prospect Account needs to be set up in VOS, and is part of a national account. Please contact the sales rep if you have any questions or need more details. Prospect Name: " + {!myVariable_current.Name} + " Address: " + {!myVariable_current.BillingStreet} + ", " + {!myVariable_current.BillingCity} + ", " +{!myVariable_current.BillingState} + ", " + {!myVariable_current.BillingPostalCode} + " Duns Number: "+{!myVariable_current.D_U_N_S__c} + ", Segment: " + TEXT({!myVariable_current.Prospect_Segment__c} ) + ", Sales Rep: " + {!myVariable_current.OwnerId}

Flow.label: Credit Application
